column1: The tortoise moved quite slowly.  She was never be able to collect enough tree branches to build a proper house. She sat down and thought about what to do.  After thinking for a long time
column2: she decided to go in search of a house that was already built. One day
column3: she saw a cave. She peered inside. It looked warm and dry!  But the cave belonged to a rabbit and her children. She climbed up a tree. But
column4: she was chased away by birds chirping and cawing noisily in their nests.  The tortoise walked away sadly
column5: sweating in the heat of the sun. One day
column6: as the tortoise was wandering about
column7: she found a cow in its pen. She was with her calves.  "Can I join you
column9: said the cow, but we can't help you. It's full in here already."
